definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be separate, isolated (Ar. bad=un cause to withdraw; II. separate, disunite, Ge 11:8 Saad.; IV. divide into parts; x. go alone, act independently), only Pt. [[בּוֹדֵד]] Is 14:31 (of straggler in army), Ho 8:9 [[פֶּרֶא בוֹדֵד לוֹ]] a wild-ass (sim. of Ephr.) going alone for itself (i.e. willfully: v. sub [[לְ]]), Ps 102:8 (of bird sitting solitarily).
